website_summaries.verdict: Designed for analytical types who appreciate healthy lawns as well.
pros: Lawns and gardens will benefit from the device's smart irrigation features that adapt to unique needs
Software computes custom data analysis to deliver recommendations
App available for Apple and Android devices
Great starter technology for those with old homes or antiquated irrigation systems
cons: Some systems lose battery power quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: For the last couple of years we have been growing vegetables for donation to the local food bank. This year we decided to step up to automated watering and went with Spruce and the matching sensors. Wow, 185 lbs of vegetables later, we are blown away! Spruce has helped us grow way more than we previously had and is so much easier to setup and monitor. The garden is at our local Synagogue and with Spruce I can see exactly when it has been watering and even monitor soil moisture all from home. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Albert

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money wisely elsewhere and not on this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this timer thinking it would save me on my water bill. It’s been installed for a Little over a month now and have yet to work like advanced. Now it’s disconnected from my WiFi system and will not reconnect. I also bought the moisture sensor and I’m not able to get them to synchronize with the timer. Not really seeing where to get help from Spruce.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: I could easily setup a schedule that used weather to adjust or ...
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new home with an ancient knob and button sprinkler system with some cryptic instructions on setting a schedule. Quickly decided it was time for an upgrade. What a night and day difference. I could easily setup a schedule that used weather to adjust or skip watering all year round. The schedule they call connected, setup the times automatically after I set the different zone areas up. From the charts I can see the water times decrease as we have moved into winter. Now it is barely watering at all and I didn't need to touch a single setting!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Hit a snag with sensors but it's getting better!
customer_reviews.text: I previously reviewed this product, not having known I received a bad batch of sensors. I will revisit my review upon receiving and testing the new ones. I will say with 100% certainty, that the Spruice Customer Service group is one of the best I have worked with. They respond immediately, usually within the same day, and always provide answers to my questions. Even beyond normal technical support as been provided for Home-Automation, and sensor structures. Hopefully this new batch of sensors will work out and this will be 5 stars soon!
customer_reviews.author: TJBHunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Rain Bird controller with the Spruce Irrigation Sprinkler Controller (Gen2) and I could not be happier! The install was super easy, it took about 45 minutes to complete. It connected to my WI-FI immediately and it responds to the Spruce app on my iphone without any issues. I also added the Spruce skill on Alexa and I can turn it on and off that way too! It would have been nice if it came with a sensor, but I'm sure I will be adding them soon!
customer_reviews.author: Franz

customer_reviews.title: Very good irrigation control
customer_reviews.text: First unit came with a problem, but support help me to identify and replace the unit. After replace, it works perfectly. Easy to install and permit different schedule configurations. Great product for value.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Lemos

customer_reviews.title: ... controller for a few days but so far it's great. Physical insulation was a breeze just be sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the controller for a few days but so far it's great. Physical installation was a breeze just be sure to write down or take a picture of your current wire color per zone to take any of the guess work out. Now on to using the spruce website app. It's super easy to use on either Android or Windows PC (don't have anything mac). If your in an area that is constantly going on water restrictions this controller is for you.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss with sensors
customer_reviews.text: The unit has great range using moisture sensors mounted in back of the house in a large yard around 125 foot sensor range. I found I could not get sensors to work on the opposite side of the house at about 75 foot even with ZigBee repeaters in the house that they listed on their web site. I wish it would have worked for my situation. Everyone's situation is different so it is a trial situation in the end to see if it works using wireless sensors. It is a nice controller and I was impressed with all the settings for watering that could be changed for anyone's situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from the Gen 1 Controller
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the SmartThings-based gen 1 controller after talking with Spruce support about the lack of support for it in the new SmartThings app. I love the new Spruce app. It makes it much easier to control everything and know what the system is planning on doing and why. Very good upgrade, though I hope they continue to improve their integration with SmartThings.
customer_reviews.author: kjrobinet

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing. Was extremely easy to setup and get running with the app. The only reason I did not give all 5 stars on "Easy to Use" is that the entry hole for the wires needs to be a bit larger. I actually have 16 zones, so trying to force feed all those wires including the pump and common wires was a bit of a hassle. Aside from that, everything was extremely simple!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing, I am very happy with this item. I had recommended to many friends and family. TKS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy Setup. Worked perfectly and was very simple to use. Each zone is very configurable and i can even manually control each zone from the unit for testing and things. So far, product is exactly as expected. Great work spruce!
customer_reviews.author: Alex J

customer_reviews.title: Control
customer_reviews.text: Wi control. Easy to install. The 3 rd one I bought for different homes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and sophisticated options
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. If you are replacing another system, just make sure you make a note of the zones each color-coded wire is associated with. Love how it can be programmed to cycle through zones.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out an old Rain Bird ESP. Very easy to install and to setup! Raining outside, so haven’t had the opportunity to test it yet, but looks great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Byron Morris

customer_reviews.title: a piece of crap they market as high tech irrigation
customer_reviews.text: this thing never connects to your WIFI when you needed essentially, a piece of crap they market as high tech irrigation. sucks and when you go to the spruce site, its always "Downloading Assets". really WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Seena Abraham

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.text: My old home I used B-Hyve products which attached directly to the spicket. Our new home had a build in sprinkler system. Instal only took about an hour and was very easy to figure out. Usually I make mistakes when installing things and have to redo it but not with this product. Wonderful App and easy to navigate. My sprinkler company was going to charge me $800 for a similar wifi control box. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Not so smart irrigation controller
customer_reviews.text: The controller is easy to install and connect to the network. The sensors are a problem. Their range is limited, which requires the addition of more Zig-bee devices to extend the range. The sensors will periodically lose connection to the controller, but you’ll never know that unless you are checking the system regularly. In addition, the controller sees the last moisture reading and uses that as an input to either under or over water the zone.
customer_reviews.author: Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Solid device with very intelligent automation.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about six months and not only is it a great irrigation system , the integration to smartthings and hubitat is amazing. Support from developer is unreal. The gen 3 sensors work great.
customer_reviews.author: JDE

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product , have taken out the guess work of irrigation. I can dynamically set up and change the schedules based on my requirement. It also takes input from weather and landscape requirements. Also helps in identifying leaks etc. Last year I have a massive water bill since I forgot the change my schedule and went on a vacation , but after Spruce , life has become simple as I can make changes to it from anywhere in the world. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This system performed poorly and my yard suffered. In addition, it only lasted two years and then had complete malfunction. Customer service was not very responsive to my emails asking for help. I had to buy a new rain clock and recommend to STAY AWAY from this system.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sprinkler system
customer_reviews.text: Great feature packed compact sprinkler system with a lot of scheduling options. I own it for more than a year. Easy to install and operate with an intuitive mobile app. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.  Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Using to manage our sprinkler system. Love it, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Plaid Systems Spruce Irrigation 16 Zone WiFi Sprinkler Controller (Gen 2), Compatible with Alexa, Wireless Soil Moisture Sensors, Leak Detection, Flow Meter
feature_bullets: EASE OF USE: Setup and control your sprinklers anywhere with the Spruce Irrigation App, available on Apple App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android). The Spruce Web App is also accessible via any browser for mobile, tablet, or desktop/laptop use.

OPTIONAL SOIL MOISTURE SENSORS: Maximize water efficiency by adding up to 16 wireless Spruce Moisture Sensors (optional, not included). Match the sensor to a zone and water based on actual soil moisture levels

AUTOMATIC SCHEDULING: Multiple scheduling options to fit your landscape's unique watering requirements. Generate a schedule unique to each zone, based on landscape and sprinkler head parameters. Set restrictions for time of day, or day of week. Start schedules relative to sunrise or sunset.

RESPOND TO WEATHER: Automatically adjusts or skips watering based on hyper-localized weather forecast predicted rainfall, or reported actual rainfall. Check for freezing temperatures and don't water when it's too cold.

INTEGRATIONS AND NOTIFICATIONS: Spruce is Compatible with Amazon Alexa, Google Home, Samsung SmartThings, Spruce Soil Moisture Sensors, and wired flow meters. Notifications for schedules, zones, flow deviations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
